title: Constructing reality: a film on film
creator_credit: David Altschul, Journal Films and Gilbert Altschul Productions
brief_description: The five key elements of film construction - film time, film space, perspective, rhythm and sound are discussed as we construct a film within a film about a sports car race. The film shows how the film-maker planned, photographed and edited sequences.
